channel.title: Comments on: State Journal Register – They publish a very good editorial calling for efforts to combat Global Warming

item.title: By: Now Trending » State Journal Register
item.dc:creator: Now Trending » State Journal Register
item.description: [...] Thanks for your recent Editorial supporting attempts to help prevent Global Warming. There is no need to apologize for supporting such efforts though, because when America stops doing things that make no economic sense, America makes money and produces jobs every time.6 [...]
